items.title: RAGBRAI, the World’s Largest Recreational Bike Ride, Is Getting Hotter and Harder
items.description: Laura Ferguson has a strict no-plastic-water-bottle rule when she bikes across Iowa.  She has managed to complete 19 RAGBRAIs—the Register’s Annual Great Bike Across Iowa—relying solely on hoses, taps and her reusable water bottles.
